value.name: Santa Fe police officer involved in fatal shooting identified
value.description: A man named Andrew James Lucero has an extensive criminal history in the Santa Fe area, court records show, but that man is not 33 years old, the age the State Police gave for the suspect shot by ...

value.name: SFPD video shows fatal confrontation
value.description: A statement released by State Police on Wednesday said SFPD Officer Leo Guzman, a three-year veteran of the department, fatally shot 33-year-old Andrew James Lucero in the abdomen around 10 p.m ...
